# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.8 FATAL_ERROR)
SET(VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR "/usr/gapps/visit/2.5.2/linux-x86_64/include")
SET(VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR "/usr/gapps/visit/2.5.2/linux-x86_64/lib")
SET(VISIT_BINARY_DIR "/usr/gapps/visit/2.5.2/linux-x86_64/bin")
SET(VISIT_ARCHIVE_DIR "/usr/gapps/visit/2.5.2/linux-x86_64/archives")
SET(VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR "/g/g0/rcook/.visit/2.5.2/linux-x86_64/plugins")
INCLUDE("/usr/gapps/visit/2.5.2/linux-x86_64/include/PluginVsInstall.cmake")
INCLUDE("/usr/gapps/visit/2.5.2/linux-x86_64/include/VisItLibraryDependencies.cmake")

PROJECT(paraDIS)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
paraDISPluginInfo.C
paraDISCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
paraDISPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
paraDISMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtparaDISFileFormat.C
avtparaDISOptions.C
parallelParaDIS.C
Dumpfile.C
paraDIS_lib/paradis.C
paraDIS_lib/paradis_c_interface.C
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/args.c
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/debugutil.c
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/fileutils.c
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/inventor.c
RC_cpp_lib/RangeList.C
RC_cpp_lib/timer.C
RC_cpp_lib/pathutil.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
paraDISEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtparaDISFileFormat.C
avtparaDISOptions.C
parallelParaDIS.C
Dumpfile.C
paraDIS_lib/paradis.C
paraDIS_lib/paradis_c_interface.C
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/args.c
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/debugutil.c
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/fileutils.c
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/inventor.c
RC_cpp_lib/RangeList.C
RC_cpp_lib/timer.C
RC_cpp_lib/pathutil.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
paraDIS_lib
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib
RC_cpp_lib
${BOOST_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
)

ADD_DEFINITIONS("-DRC_CPP_VISIT_BUILD")

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IparaDISDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IparaDISDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IparaDISDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MparaDISDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MparaDISDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MparaDISDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MparaDISDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EparaDISDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EparaDISDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EparaDISDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EparaDISDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EparaDISDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EparaDISDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EparaDISDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EparaDISDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
